And if <WG2579> <WG99999> it bear <WG4160> fruit <WG2590>, well <WG1161>: and if <WG1487> not <WG3361>, then <WG1519> after that <WG3195> you shall cut <WG1581> it <WG846> down <WG1581>.

And <WG2532> he laid <WG2007> his hands <WG5495> on her <WG846>: and <WG2532> immediately <WG3916> she was made straight <WG461>, and <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> God <WG2316>.

Then <WG1161> said <WG2036> one <WG5100> to him <WG846>, Lord <WG2962>, are there <WG1487> few <WG3641> that <WG3588> are saved <WG4982>? And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> to <WG4314> them <WG846>,

When <WG575> once <WG3739> <WG99999> the master of the house <WG3617> has risen up <WG1453>, and <WG2532> has shut <WG608> the door <WG2374>, and <WG2532> you begin <WG756> to stand <WG2476> outside <WG1854>, and <WG2532> to knock <WG2925> at the door <WG2374>, saying <WG3004>, Lord <WG2962>, Lord <WG2962>, open <WG455> to us <WG2254>; and <WG2532> he shall answer <WG611> and say <WG2046> to you <WG5213>, I don <WG3756>'t know <WG1492> you <WG5209>, nor where <WG4159> you are from <WG2075>:
